content: from this position through back of loops 1 stitch decreased k2tog knit 2 sotches together 1 sotch decreased ssp slip 2 sotches knitwise one at a ome then purl together through back of loops 1 sotch decreased p2tog purl 2 sotches together 1 sotch decreased sl1 slip 1 sotch purlwise from l needle to r needle psso pass slipped sotch over 1 sotch decreased increasing … yrn us yo bring the yarn from back of work to the front between the 2 needle points then over r needle to the back before kni ng the next sotch 1 sotch increased if you are new to kni/ng www knittinghelp com/ has instruc4onal videos of all the above basic s4tches/techniques safety tiny buttons straps and small pieces should not be in the vicinity of young children and babies 4 useful resource links blaze from the little tearoom bears madelinetosh unicorn tales knitting pattern lichen & lace -
